prodNameC: 羅氏全自動”達可”C型肝炎病毒量核酸檢驗套組
ingredientsDesc:
HCV CS1 (HCV Magnetic Glass Particles Reagent Cassette) 1 x 48 Tests
HCV CS2(HCV Lysis Reagent Cassette) 1 x 48 Tests
HCV CS3 1 x 48 Tests
Pase (Proteinase Solution) 1 x 3.8 mL
EB (Elution Buffer) 1 x 7.0 mL
HCV CS4 1 x 48 Tests
HCV QS(HCV Quantitation Standard) 1 x 3.6 mL
HCV MMX (HCV Master Mix) 1 x 2.5 mL
CAP/CTM Mn2+ (CAP/CTM Manganese Solution)1 x 19.8 mL
HCV H(+)C(HCV High Positive Control) 4 x 1.0 mL
HCV L(+)C(HCV Low Positive Control) 4 x 1.0 mL
CTM (–) C [COBAS TaqMan Negative Control (Human Plasma)] 4 x 1.0 mL
COBAS AmpliPrep/COBAS TaqMan Wash Reagent 1 x 5.1 L
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: 羅氏全自動”達可”C型肝炎病毒量核酸檢驗套組是一種利用核酸擴增法, 定量偵測人類血漿或血清中HCV RNA之體外檢驗試劑，其使用COBAS AmpliPrep儀器來自動化處理檢體及利用COBAS TaqMan分析儀或COBAS TaqMan 48分析儀做自動化擴增與偵測。
mdFormat: COBAS Ampliprep/COBAS TaqMan HCV Test: 48 tests/kit

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 1080 US HIGHWAY 202 SOUTH, BRANCHBURG, NJ 08876 USA
